amendment.description: To establish a congressional commission to examine the Federal, State, and local response to the devastation wrought by Hurricane Katrina in the Gulf Region of the United States especially in the States of Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, and other areas impacted in the aftermath and make immediate corrective measures to improve such responses in the future.

action.text: Amendment SA 2716 proposed by Senator Clinton to Amendment SA 2707.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2716.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2716 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 6.
Amendment SA 2716 ruled out of order by the chair.
